1.title: First Day
1.plot: In this two-part episode, agents struggle with a case while Oscar interviews candidates to run the Odd Squad Creature Room.

2.title: Back to the Past/Odd Squad Needs You
2.plot: When the agents are accidentally transported to the future, they need to figure out what day it is or risk a time-tastrophe.

3.title: Mid-Day in the Garden of Good and Odd/Failure to Lunch
3.plot: Mid-Day in the Garden of Good and Odd - When things in town get covered in jam, the agents turn to Odd Todd for help./ Failure to Lunch - When the agents go to lunch, they struggle to relax and ignore the oddness.

4.title: The O Team/Show Me the Money
4.plot: Security agents Owen and Ohio secretly provide backup on a case so they can have a pizza party.

5.title: Flawed Squad/The Creature Whisperer
5.plot: Flawed Squad - A motley crew of villains storm into Odd Squad headquarters, but can't agree on a plan of attack. The Creature Whisperer - When a creature gets loose in headquarters, Oscar helps Ocean track it down, while Olympia and Otis try to keep Ms. O distracted.

6.title: Oscar Strikes Back
6.plot: Oscar takes some time off so he can attend Lab-Con--for the first time. However, someone is controlling the minds of all of the convention attendants except for Oscar, Miss O and Oona. No one's going to ruin Oscar's first Lab-Con. It's time that "Oscar Strikes Back".

7.title: Olympia's Day/Otis's Day
7.plot: Olympia's Day: When a new room opens up in headquarters, all the agents want a piece./ Otis's Day: Getting a villain back to headquarters proves cumbersome when the tubes are down for maintenance.

8.title: And Then They Were Puppies/A Case of the Sillies
8.plot: And Then They Were Puppies - When every agent turns into a puppy, it's up to Agent Ohlm to save the day./ A Case of the Sillies - Dr. O gets an odd illness called the Sillies.

9.title: Happy Halfiversary/Good Egg Bad Egg
9.plot: Happy Halfiversary - Otis discovers he's forgotten an important event in his partnership with Olympia. Now, with Oona and Ms. O providing assistance, he sets off on an odd adventure to set things right./ Good Egg Bad Egg - The agents try to determine what kind of creature will hatch from an egg.

10.title: Night Shift/Put Me in Coach
10.plot: Night Shift - Olympia and Otis work the Odd Squad Night Shift and find out that at night the squad works very differently./ Put Me in Coach - When Ms. O accidentally assigns Olympia and Otis and a rival duo to the same coveted case she sends them all to Coach O, who sets up a competition between the teams to resolve who gets the case.

11.title: Extreme Cakeover/A Job Well Undone
11.plot: Otis and Olympia accidently release a virus that turns agents into cakes. Otis has to race to fill out his paperwork so he and Olympia can earn "employee of the month".

12.title: Three's Company/Behind Enemy Mimes
12.plot: Three's Company - When Ms. O's office must be repaired due to odd infestations, she cramps Olympia and Otis's style./ Behind Enemy Mimes - Ms. O needs Otis and Olympia's help to track down her old partner O'Donahue.

13.title: Drop Gadget Repeat/20 Questions
13.plot: Drop Gadget Repeat - Oona, Olympia and Otis try to escape from a time loop./ 20 Questions - A villain sets off a backwards bubble that causes everyone at headquarters to move backwards.

14.title: High Maintenance/Not OK Computer
14.plot: High Maintenance - Otis and Olympia accept a challenge to switch jobs with the maintenance department for a day./ Not OK Computer - When Olympia and Otis get trapped in their computer, it's up to the Odd Squad Computer Department to rescue them.

15.title: O Is for Opposite/Agent Oksana's Kitchen Nightmares
15.plot: Olympia and Otis try to resolve a labour dispute between Oksana and Ms. O.

16.title: Rookie Night/Who Let the Doug Out?
16.plot: Rookie Night - It's party time for all the new agents at Odd Squad./ Who Let The Doug Out? - Delivery Doug needs help with an egg situation.

17.title: Cherry-on-Top-Inator/Sir
17.plot: The Cherry-On-Top-Inator - Agents recall how a beloved gadget helped them./ Sir - The agents bring someone with an odd problem back to headquarters.

18.title: Agent Orchid's Almost Half Hour Talent Show/The Perfect Score
18.plot: Orchid's Almost Half Hour Talent Show - All the agents want to be a part of Orchid's talent show./ The Perfect Score - It's villain report card day at Odd Squad.

19.title: The Voice/Partner Problems
19.plot: The Voice - When Ms. O's voice is stolen, Otis and Olympia must track it down before headquarters descends into chaos./ Partner Problems - Otis tries to help Orchid and Ohlm solve a case.

20.title: Oona and the Oonabots/The Ninja Situation
20.plot: Oona and the Oonabots - Oona uses her Oonabots to help Ocean catch a creature./ The Ninja Situation - Otis must go undercover as a ninja to recover a stolen Odd Squad gadget from a pair of strange villains.

22.title: Safe House in the Woods/Haunt Squad
22.plot: Safe House in the Woods - Owen and new recruit Ozlyn wait out a storm while transporting a creature./ Haunt Squad - Odd Squad is haunted by a ghost.

23.title: Xs and Os/Dr. O-No
23.plot: X's and O's - A special task force arrives to shut down the Odd Squad Headquarters./ Dr.O No - Oona struggles to help Dr. O's replacement cure patients with an odd ailment.

24.title: License to Science/Negative Town
24.plot: License to Science - Oona must pass her lab director's test or risk getting kicked off Odd Squad./ Negative Town - The agents go to Negative Town to track a villain.

25.title: Ocean and the Fly/Two Agents and a Baby
25.plot: Ocean and the Fly - Oona tells the story of when she switched bodies with a fly. Two Agents and a Baby - Olympia and Otis baby-sit Baby Genius.

27.title: Shapely University/Slow Day
27.plot: Agents compete against rival Odd Squad agents to solve an odd problem. Then, Otis and Olympia investigate why people in town are stuck in slow motion.

28.title: Villains In Need Are Villains Indeed/Happily Ever Odd
28.plot: Villains in Need are Villains InDeed - Jamie Jam, Mr. Lightning, and Noisemaker make a robot to destroy Odd Squad, but loose control of it. Who do they turn to for help ? Happily Ever Odd - Ronny plans to marry Bonny but Donny is missing. Can Odd Squad help ?

29.title: Where There's a Wolf, There's a Way/New Jacket Required
29.plot: Odd Squad is haunted by a ghost. Then, Owen and new recruit Ozlyn wait out a storm while transporting a creature!

31.title: Other Olympia/Total Zeroes
31.plot: Other Olympia - Olympia squares off with another Agent named Olympia. Total Zeros - Ms. O tells Olympia and Otis an old story about a villain duo with the power of zero.

32.title: It Takes Goo to Make a Feud Go Right/Friends of Odd Squad
32.plot: It Takes Goo to Make a Feud Go Right: Olympia and Otis are tasked with calling a truce between feuding guests. Friends of Odd Squad: Ms. O leaves headquarters in the hands of an unlikely crew.

52.title: The Breakfast Club/Dr. O: Party Time, Excellent
52.plot: The Breakfast Club - Delivery Debbie goes undercover to stop a group of villains./ Dr. O: Party Time, Excellent - When Olympia finds out Dr. O is leaving, she struggles to throw the best goodbye party ever.

55.title: Haunt Squad/Safe House in the Woods
55.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

57.title: Hands on the Desk Chair/There is No "O" in O-Bot
57.plot: Hands on a Desk Chair - When Ms. O leaves to conduct a super-secret mission, agents at Headquarters figure out who is in charge./ There's No 'O' in O-Bot - Otis and Olympia are stuck with a new robot partner.

59.title: The Deposit Slip-Up/Villains Always Win
59.plot: The Deposit Slip-Up - Odd Squad builds an exact replica of the Villain's Vault to intercept a jet-pack. Friends of Odd Squad - Ms. O leaves headquarters in the hands of an unlikely crew.

70.title: Who Is Agent Otis?
70.plot: Olympia discovers a secret about her partner.

71.title: Odds and Ends
71.plot: The agents face an unlikely villain and must work together to save the world.

72.title: Saving Agent Orson/The Scientist
72.plot: Saving Agent Orson - The X's want to kick Baby Agent Orson off the Squad./ The Scientist - Oona gets zapped to an alternate dimension and must figure out a way to get back home.

77.title: Episode #2.77
77.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Zero Effect/Bad Luck Bears
1.plot: Zero Effect: Olive and Otto must stop zeroes from disappearing before the missing zeroes destroy the town and Otto turns into a baby. Bad Luck Bears: When odd things start happening to the Bears basketball team, Olive and Otto must set things straight before the big game.

2.title: Soundcheck/Double Trouble
2.plot: Soundcheck: Olive and Otto must figure out how and why things are disappearing around town when all Otto wants to do is listen to a song by his favorite band, Soundcheck. Double Trouble: Debbie from Debbie's Pizzeria has doubled..not once but twice, creating four Debbies. When one of the four Debbies goes missing, Olive and Otto need to find her.

3.title: Crime at Shapely Manor
3.plot: In this half-hour episode, Olive and Otto are sent to Shapley Manor to investigate an odd crime with even odder people.

4.title: Reindeer Games
4.plot: In this half-hour episode, Olive and Otto help Santa track down his missing reindeer. Also, Oscar helps Ms. O get off Santa's naughty list.

5.title: My Better Half/The Confalones
5.plot: My Better Half: When symmetrical objects become vandalized, Olive and Otto must figure out why. The Confalones: Olive and Otto are called in to help when objects and, eventually, people start disappearing inside an Italian restaurant.

6.title: Blob on the Job/Party of 54321
6.plot: Blob on the Job: When a blob gets loose in Odd Squad headquarters, Olive and Otto compete against rival agents to catch it first. Party of 5,4,3,2,1: When people in town can no longer count down, Olive and Otto must uncover who is causing the problem and why.

7.title: Oscar and the Oscarbots/Picture Day
7.plot: Oscar and the Oscarbots: When several of Oscar's Oscarbots become lost in town, Olive and Otto must help find them. Picture Day: Otto and Olive investigate why people in town are becoming plaid and striped.

8.title: A Case of the Sing Alongs/Ms. O Uh Oh
8.plot: A Case of the Sing-Alongs: When Mayor Macklemore catches a case of the Sing A Longs, Olive and Otto must discover the cause before the Mayor sings his way out of his job. Ms. O Uh-Oh: When a Ms. O from the past shows up at the office, Otto and Oscar must send her back to the day she came from or risk causing a time-tastrophe.

9.title: Skip Day/The Great Grinaldi
9.plot: Skip Day: When Olive catches a case of the Skips and goes missing, rookie agent Otto must solve his first case by himself. The Great Grinaldi: Otto rushes to finish a case so he can see his favorite magician, The Great Grinaldi, perform.

10.title: The Trouble with Centigurps/Totally Odd Squad
10.plot: The Trouble with Centigurps: When Otto accidentally releases 100 small furry creatures in headquarters, he recruits Oscar to help get them back before Ms. O finds out. Totally Odd Squad: In a flashback episode, Ms. O tells the story of how she defeated a villain called the Patternista back when she was an agent.

11.title: How to Interrogate a Unicorn/The Briefcase
11.plot: When characters escape their books in the library, Olive and Otto must figure out how and why it's happening and put a stop to it. When Ms. O's important briefcase is stolen by a shape shifter, Olive and Otto must get it back.

12.title: Best Seats in the House/Agent Obfusco
12.plot: Olive and Otto battle Oren and Olaf for the best chairs at Odd Squad while Ms. O and Oscar run a top secret mission. Olive and Otto become concerned when they find out their Odd Squad test is being administered by the mysterious Agent Obfusco.

13.title: Life of O'Brian/Whatever Happened to Agent Oz
13.plot: When a miffed O'Brian won't let Olive access the tubes, she has to solve the mystery of what she did to upset him. Olive tells Otto the story of what happened to Octavia's partner, Agent Oz.

14.title: The Jackies/Invasion of the Body Switchers
14.plot: Ms. O and her team will stop at nothing to win their very first Jackie Award. When Ms. O and Oscar accidentally switch bodies, Olive and Otto must set things right before the entire Odd Squad team finds out what happened.

15.title: The Odd Antidote/The One That Got Away
15.plot: When Ms. O gets sprayed by a plant and starts turning weird, Dr. O sends Olive and Otto on a mission to find the cure. The only thing that can bring Ms. O's old partner O'Donahue out of retirement is the one thing that put him there in the first place: a mysterious villain and a case that's gone unsolved for years.

16.title: Odd Outbreak/The Perfect Lunch
16.plot: Dr. O takes the lead on the case of a strange medical crisis that causes chaos right in middle of Odd Squad HQ. Olive, Otto and Oscar help Ms. O host a lunch for some very important but easily offended guests.

17.title: Rise of the Hydraclops/O Is Not for Old
17.plot: In order to save humanity, Olive and Otto must locate a treasure chest that Oscar buried. The agents throw a surprise party for Ms. O.

18.title: Dance Like Nobody's Watching/Recipe for Disaster
18.plot: When the alarm system at Headquarters is triggered, Olive, Otto, Ms. O and Oscar must avoid a series of booby traps in order to shut it off. Olive and Otto explain to Ms. O how a case went wrong, each in their own way.

19.title: Hold the Door/Flatastrophe
19.plot: When a young Agent-in-Training gets lost in headquarters, Olive and Otto must find him before Ms. O finds out. Olive and Otto must stop Fladam, a villain with a vendetta against cubes.

20.title: Puppet Show/Mystic Egg Pizza
20.plot: Olive and Otto have to crack a case where a group of people have been turned into puppets. With the help of Odd Squad, Delivery Debbie and Delivery Doug must figure out why their food is disappearing.

21.title: 6:00 to 6:05
21.plot: When dinosaurs break out of the dinosaur room in headquarters, Olive and Otto must travel back in time to stop it from ever happening.

22.title: The Potato Ultimato/A Fistful of Fruit Juice
22.plot: When Otto starts shrinking, Olaf leads Olive and Oren on a quest for the only known cure-- The Magical Growing Potato. Ms. O tells Olive and Otto the story of how she first joined up with Odd Squad.

23.title: Soundcheck Part Deux/Jinx
23.plot: When the members of Soundcheck go missing, Olive and Otto must bring them back together in time for their big concert. When all of Odd Squad comes down with a case of the jinx, it's up to Oscar and Dr. O to save the day.

24.title: Training Day
24.plot: Olive tells the story of what happened to her old partner.

25.title: Trading Places/Bad Lemonade
25.plot: A villain uses one of Oscar's gadgets to cause destruction around town, which eventually leads to Olive getting kicked off the squad. Olive and Otto are called in to help when Polly Graph mysteriously quits lemonade stand.

26.title: Robert Plant/Game Time
26.plot: Olive and Otto must find a way to stop Obfusco's plant from taking over headquarters. When Otto gets trapped inside a video game it's up to Olive to rescue.

27.title: The O Games
27.plot: Odd Squad agents compete in an Olympic style games to determine who gets to be Ms. O for the day.

28.title: Captain Fun/Switch Your Partner Round and Round
28.plot: Otto and Oren compete for votes to become Captain Fun. Olive and Otto discover what life would have been like if Ms. O had assigned them different partners.

29.title: Trials and Tubulations
29.plot: In this half-hour episode, the tube system breaks and Olive and Otto are left stranded in a dangerous forest.

30.title: The Curious Case of Pirate-itis/Oscar the Couch
30.plot: Otto and Oscar try to stop Olive from turning into a pirate. Oscar accidentally turns himself into a couch.

31.title: No Ifs, Ands, or Robots/Worst First Day Ever
31.plot: Chaos ensues when one of Oscar's Oscarbots malfunction. When Agent Ori's first day on the job turns into a worse-case scenario, other Odd Squad agents share their own "worst first day ever" stories.

32.title: Undercover Olive
32.plot: In this half-hour episode, Olive goes undercover in a high stakes "Rock, Paper, Scissors" game.

33.title: Not So Splash/By the Book
33.plot: In the middle of summer, Olive and Otto must figure out why parts of the town are turning snowy and cold. Olive and Otto interrogate two suspects to figure out which one is innocent and which one is guilty.

34.title: O Vs. The Ballcano/Assistant's Creed
34.plot: When the ball pit starts to overflow, Odd Squad must stop headquarters from being destroyed. Two of Ms. O's assistants accidentally find themselves on a mission.

35.title: Now You Don't See Me/Moustache Confidential
35.plot: Olive and Otto must stop a villain who has turned townspeople and Odd Squad agents invisible. When Agent Obfusco's moustache is stolen, it's up to Olive and Otto to get it back.

36.title: Disorder in the Court
36.plot: In this half-hour episode, Olive is put on trial for causing oddness.

37.title: Oscar of All Trades/Swamps 'N Gators
37.plot: Oscar tells Olive about his early days at Odd Squad. Olive and Otto get trapped inside a board game.

38.title: There Might Be Dragons/Dawn of the Read
38.plot: When the power goes out in headquarters, Odd Squad must figure out a way to control the temperature of dragon eggs. Odd Squad takes on a page-turner of a case at the local library, where books are mysteriously coming to life.

39.title: Olive and Otto in Shmumberland
39.plot: When Olive and Otto get zapped into a comic book, Olive must use her knowledge of the comic book to escape.

40.title: O is Not for Over
40.plot: Olive and Otto face their biggest challenge yet.

imdb.plot outline: Young government agents Olive and Otto use math to investigate strange occurrences in their town. Produced by The Fred Rogers Co., this live-action series targets preschool and early elementary schoolchildren and their families. Odd Squad cases include disappearing zeroes, Santa's missing reindeer, runaway dinosaurs, and characters who escape from books. Throughout the series, Olive and Otto learn not only how to solve problems but also about working together, communication and perseverance.
imdb.title: Odd Squad
plot: Geared for children ages 5-8, "_Odd Squad_ (qv)" follows two young agents, Olive and Otto, who are part of an agency that seeks to save the day using math when odd things happen.::Anonymous

Young government agents Olive and Otto use math to investigate strange occurrences in their town. Produced by The Fred Rogers Co., this live-action series targets preschool and early elementary schoolchildren and their families. _Odd Squad_ (qv) cases include disappearing zeroes, Santa's missing reindeer, runaway dinosaurs, and characters who escape from books. Throughout the series, Olive and Otto learn not only how to solve problems but also about working together, communication and perseverance.::Jwelch5742
